codes.ACHP: Investigation is related to an ACH or mass payment.
codes.CARD: Investigation is related to a card transaction.
codes.CHQB: Investigation is related to a cheque.
codes.DDTP: Investigation is related to a direct debit.
codes.DRFT: Investigation is related to a draft.
codes.INST: Investigation is related to an instant credit transfer.
codes.SRTP: Investigation is related to a request to pay.
codes.STAT: Investigation is related to a statement entry.
codes.URGP: Investigation is related to a wire/high value payment.
codes.XBCT: Investigation is related to a cross border payment.

description: Specifies the type of instrument or product to which the investigation refers, as published in an external investigation instrument code set.
name: ExternalInvestigationInstrument1Code
